definition: front part (of an object)/first part (of an event)/previous paragraph
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: There will be no more negative trends of the previous period in summer.
sentences.chinese: 前段時間的事情在夏天不會向不好的趨勢發展。

sentences.english: Do you remember luxury yacht-island that we’ve shown you some time ago?
sentences.chinese: 你是否記得前段時間我們向你展示的豪華遊艇旅遊？

sentences.english: Methods Self-made plastic gun was used to produce the eyeball rupture model.
sentences.chinese: 方法自制氣槍製做前段眼球破裂傷模型。

sentences.english: Two pairs of liver diverticulum respectively protrude from the anterior wall of mid-gut.
sentences.chinese: 兩對肝盲囊分別發生自中腸的前段腸壁。

sentences.english: Before paragraph time, this supermarket sticks annunciate to say.
sentences.chinese: 前段時間，這家超市貼告示說。

sentences.english: As suggested in the previous paragraph, the rela¬tionship is also influenced by the extent to which the risk assessment is routine.
sentences.chinese: 如前段所述，此關係也受到常規風險評價程度的影響。

sentences.english: Some time ago, a new phrase "high marks but poor competence" came into being.
sentences.chinese: 前段時間，社會上出現了一個新詞“高分低能”。

sentences.english: Some time ago the company transferred to a foreign trainee manager.
sentences.chinese: 前段時間公司裏調來一個外國的實習經理。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length
to stop in the middle of sth/intermittent/intermittence
